title: New: Emma Foti – Where Is The Light
content:
This gorgeous acoustic number comes courtesy of New York songstress Emma Foti.

Entirely acoustic tracks can be defiantly difficult to write and often accused of lacking soul however Emma’s enchanting voice ensures Where Is The Light develops a real personality of it’s own. The Laura Marling and Feist influences are resounding but not all consuming, whilst the lyrics are vulnerably honest; ‘my past is hollow my virtue is gone, pride in the things that I am not, flowers bloom but my feet are cold, you make it look easy and i grow old’. Stream or download it for free below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
